data.title: A Short to A Site Cove
data.description: A good Cove to block both A Heaven on-top of Truck and the left side of A Site Triple Box.

data.title: A Short to A Heaven Cove
data.description: A good Cove you can throw to block A Heaven.

data.title: B Long to B Site High Tide
data.description: A good High Tide to block both Elbow and B Side Defender Spawn entrances into B Site.
